page.title: 16Homes
page.content: The housing is mostly of a very high standard. Bungalows feature strongly in the S.E. of the block especially near the Fairway. Here there are many tree-lined avenues and boulevards, featuring chestnut, oak and flowering cherry. In the S.W.,the children did a survey of 1403 homes and found that 47% were semi-detached houses,chalets, or bungalows;36% were detached houses, bungalows or chalets;8% were apartment blocks,and 9% were terraced. The children at Hadleigh Jun.Sch.live in mostly centrally heated homes with gardens to play in.Some share bedrooms with their siblings and a few have their own T.V.s and computers in their rooms.All homes today have bathrooms, some have showers and cloakrooms as well.Under the main colour T.V.,many families have a video recorder and they hire full length films to watch.
